blkioWeight.title: Block IO weight
blkioWeight.description: Block IO (relative weight), between 10 and 1000, or 0 to disable

blkioWeightDevice.title: Block IO device weight
blkioWeightDevice.description: Device specific block IO relative weight

capAdd.title: Add capabilities
capAdd.description: A list of Linux capabilities to add

capDrop.title: Drop capabilities
capDrop.description: A list of Linux capabilities to drop

cgroupParent.title: Parent cgroup
cgroupParent.description: Optional parent cgroup for the container

cgroupns.title: Cgroup namespace
cgroupns.description: Cgroup namespace to use. `host` runs the container in the Docker host's cgroup namespace, `private` runs the container in its own private cgroup namespace. By default, Docker uses the cgroup namespace as configured by the `default-cgroupns-mode` option on the daemon

cidfile.title: Container ID file
cidfile.description: Write the container ID to the file

command.title: Command
command.description: Command to run when deploying the container

containerId.title: Container ID
containerId.description: When referencing an external environment, the id of the existing container must be specified

cpuPeriod.title: CPU period
cpuPeriod.description: Limit CPU CFS (Completely Fair Scheduler) period

cpuQuota.title: CPU quota
cpuQuota.description: Limit CPU CFS (Completely Fair Scheduler) quota

cpuRTPeriod.title: CPU real-time period
cpuRTPeriod.description: Limit CPU real-time period in microseconds

cpuRTRuntime.title: CPU real-time runtime
cpuRTRuntime.description: Limit CPU real-time runtime in microseconds

cpusetCpus.title: Cpuset CPUs
cpusetCpus.description: CPUs in which to allow execution (0-3, 0,1)

cpusetMems.title: Cpuset memory
cpusetMems.description: MEMs in which to allow execution (0-3, 0,1)

detachKeys.title: Detach keys
detachKeys.description: Overrude the key sequence for detaching a container

device.title: Devices
device.description: A list of host device to add to the container

deviceCgroupRule.title: Device cgroup rules
deviceCgroupRule.description: List of rules to add to the cgroup allowed devices list

deviceReadBps.title: Devices read BPS
deviceReadBps.description: Limit read rate (bytes per second) from a device

deviceReadIops.title: Devices read IOPS
deviceReadIops.description: Limit read rate (IO per second) from a device

deviceWriteBps.title: Devices write BPS
deviceWriteBps.description: Limit write rate (bytes per second) from a device

deviceWriteIops.title: Devices write IOPS
deviceWriteIops.description: Limit write rate (IO per second) from a device

entrypoint.title: Entry point
entrypoint.description: Overwrite the default ENTRYPOINT of the image

env.title: Environment variables
env.description: Pass environment variable to contained process

envFile.title: Environment file
envFile.description: Read in a file of environment variables

expose.title: Expose ports
expose.description: Expose a port or a range of ports

gpus.title: GPUs
gpus.description: GPU devices to add to the container ('all' to pass all GPUs)

healthCmd.title: Healthcheck command
healthCmd.description: Command to run to check health

healthRetries.title: Healthcheck retries
healthRetries.description: Consecutive failures needed to report unhealthy

healthStartPeriod.title: Healthcheck start period
healthStartPeriod.description: Start period for the container to initialize before starting health-retries countdown (ms|s|m|h)

healthTimeout.title: Healthcheck timeout
healthTimeout.description: Maximum time to allow one check to run (ms|s|m|h)

init.title: Init
init.description: Run an init inside the container that forwards signals and reaps processes

labelFile.title: Labels file
labelFile.description: Read in a line delimited file of labels

memorySwap.title: Memory swap
memorySwap.description: Swap limit equal to memory plus swap (-1 to enable unlimited swap)

mount.title: Mounts
mount.description: Attach a filesystem mount to the container

network.title: Networks
network.description: Connect a container to a network

networkAlias.title: Network aliases
networkAlias.description: Attach a network-scoped alias for the container

oomKillDisable.title: Disable OOM killer
oomKillDisable.description: Disable out-of-memory killer for the container

pidsLimit.title: PIDs limit
pidsLimit.description: Tune container pids limit (-1 for unlimited

privileged.title: Privileged
privileged.description: Give extended privileges to this container

publish.title: Publish
publish.description: Publish container ports to the host

publishAll.title: Publish all
publishAll.description: Publish all exposed ports to random ports

readOnly.title: Read only
readOnly.description: Mount the container's root filesystem as read only

restart.title: Restart
restart.description: Restart policy to apply when a container exists

rm.title: Remove
rm.description: Automatically remove the container when it exits

runtime.title: Runtime
runtime.description: Runtime to use for this container

sigProxy.title: Signal proxy
sigProxy.description: Proxy received signals to the process

stopTimeout.title: Stop timeout
stopTimeout.description: Timeout (in seconds) to stop a container

storageOpt.title: Storage options
storageOpt.description: Storage driver options for the container

transferBufferSize.title: Transfer buffer size
transferBufferSize.description: Buffer size allocated for local and remote data transfers

userns.title: User namespace
userns.description: User namespace to use for the container

uts.title: UTS namespace
uts.description: UTS namespace to use for the container

volumeDriver.title: Volume driver
volumeDriver.description: Optional volume driver for the container

volumesFrom.title: Volumes from
volumesFrom.description: Mount volumes from the specified containers
